segments.text: I'll help you , Lucy . Look at what I've got here . In this small bottle , there's a magic love potion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . If you put a few drops on someone's eyelids while he's asleep , he'll fall in love with the first person he sees when he wakes up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what am I going to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just come to our house and stay over . You'll sit by his bed and greet him like a beautiful red rose , ' Good morning ! '
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like a blue rose ! My sitting by his bed ?
segments.speaker: S2
